text: ibrahimarodane avara odeyana kuritu jagalakkilidatanannnu nivu kanalillave? Allahanu atanige samrajyavannu nididdanu. ‘‘Jivanta golisuvavanu mattu sayisuvavane nanna devaru’’ endu ibrahimaru helidaga atanu ‘‘nanu jiva niduttene mattu nanu sayisuttene’’ endanu. Aga ibrahimaru ‘‘allahanu suryavannu purvadinda udayisuttane ninu adannu pascimadinda udayisu’’ endaru. A dhikkari beccibiddanu. Allahanu akramigala pangadakke margadarsana niduvudilla
